body.content: Project Bootstrap automates the tedious setup process for new projects by provisioning cloud resources, configuring pipelines, and setting up repo structure‚Äîall from a single YAML file.
Ready for the show? Watch below
Watch our Platform Squad reroute traffic from Sydney to Melbourne with zero downtime, turning disaster into a seamless ride.
Explore how Bunnings' AI platforms enables secure, centralized OpenAI deployments and empowers tools like document intelligence and team chatbots.
Synthetic Monitoring Migration

We've completed the move from Postman to Dynatrace for synthetic monitoring! Now powered by a custom Terraform module and Scalr pipeline, our monitors are managed as Infrastructure-as-Code‚Äîmaking it a breeze for developers to spin up and maintain them. We‚Äôve got 37 synthetic monitors keeping an eye on production, with real-time alerts and a central dashboard tracking it all.

body.alt: Architecture diagram showing project bootstrap flow
body.caption: Dynatrace Synthetics Dashboard

body.content: Digital Traffic Light Dashboard
We built a high-level dashboard for a quick, at-a-glance view of Digital's health.
1. The large traffic light shows the overall status of all Digital apps.
2. Smaller lights break it down per app, each with links to detailed dashboards.
3. A live event log shows the root cause behind any status change.
This dashboard is the go-to landing page when investigating alerts or reported issues‚Äîmaking it easy to spot and drill into wider problems.
Unleash Platform

body.alt: Architecture diagram showing project bootstrap flow
body.caption: Unleash Feature Flag Management Platform

body.content: 1. Formalise a single system to assert for feature state‚Äã‚Äã
2. Safe way for engineers to test in an isolated manner in production or dark launching üåú‚Äã
3. Enable üê¶ canary releases‚Äã‚Äã
4. Have one system for operational toggles‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
5. Democratize feature flag access, get non engineers involved in the product‚Äã‚Äã
Web Tribe
**Checkout Experience**: Designed to streamline and enhance the process of placing online orders
**Payment Experience**: Design and control the online purchase and redemption process for gift cards, supporting both physical and digital cards
**Loyalty service**: Handle Flybuys and OnePass related functionality such as unlinking accounts‚Äã
Range Tribe
**Chabot Service**: The chatbot provides a conversational, in-store-like experience online, helping customers find products, DIY guides, and project advice quickly and easily.‚Äã
1. Increased Conversion Rates & Order Value - Customers who engage with the chatbot have a conversion rate of 15.4%, which is 42% higher than the average for logged-in customers (10.8%)
2. The average order value for chatbot users is $226.78, which is 65% higher than the average order value for all logged-in customers. ‚Äã
**3. Scalable Customer Support** The chatbot handles thousands of customer interactions per month (e.g., 10,061 messages in April from 4,848 customers)‚Äã
**GMC Monitoring**: Ensure the reliability, security, and operational health of the GMC-related services that support Bunnings‚Äô online marketplace‚Äã‚Äã
1. By proactively monitoring the Google Merchant Center integration, customers experience fewer disruptions and more consistent access to product data and services.‚Äã
2. The Marketplace business team and other stakeholders are kept informed about the system‚Äôs production status‚Äã ‚Äã
3. Automated alerts and clear escalation paths mean that any issues affecting customer experience can be identified and addressed quickly‚Äã.
**Order and Enquiry Service:** Enables commercial team members to stay on top of quotes and orders by keeping CRM and COS in sync in near real time‚Äã

**Account Integration:** Create and keep Accounts in CRM up to date, providing Account Managers with the data to drive sales and Commercial support team members with the data to solve customer inquiries‚Äã
**Consent Integration:** Capture and store customers consent   On how to use their data. Provide data governance team with a tool to effectively manage consent data and stay compliant‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
**Contract Service:** Enable Account Managers to effectively manage Commercial customer pricing‚Äã‚Äã
App Tribe
**List Experience:** Wishlist related functionalities inside Bunnings App‚Äã
**Cafe Service:** Allows TMs to pre-order hot and cold drinks from their store‚Äôs cafe‚Äã‚Äã
Function App Migration
1. Azure function app infrastructure upgrade‚Äã
2. Migrating over 40 Azure functions‚Äã
3. Functions owned primarily by Suppliers & Products, Discover & Manage and Find & Choose squads‚Äã
Automated Vendor Informational Changes
1. Efficient Time Zone Conversion: Save valuable time by automating the conversion of time zones.
2. Clear Communication Interpretation: Simplify and accurately interpret confusing change communications.
3. Enhanced Change Visibility: Improve visibility on changes from third-party providers, contributing to better Mean Time To Detect (MTTD) when issues arise.
4. Seamlessly Scalable Solution: All within a solution that is seamlessly scalable using tools that Bunnings already has.
Preapproved Change Requests
1. On average, filling up change requests in ServiceNow can take up to 15 minutes, depending on complexity.
2. By having preapproved change templates for low risk changes, this has reduced approximately 60% of TM‚Äôs time in creating change requests.
3. Improved Compliance: Ensures that all changes adhere to compliance standards, reducing the risk of non-compliance penalties.
PagerDuty Roster Decommissions
1. We constantly work to remove the complexity of troubleshooting our platform.
2. Through this work we have reduced the amount of on-call rosters required to keep our Digital platforms available.
3. We have brought down the amount of technical specialist rosters within the Digital department to 4.
4. The reduction in on-call support teams is saving us $46,000 p.a, with the additional value of letting our technical team members sleep soundly.

title: Proactive Process Improvements Driving Real Impact
subTitle: Reducing incidents, saving time, and keeping Digital teams focused.

body.content: Processes Defined & Implemented, streamlining support and preventing incidents coming through to Digital teams.
1. OnePass account unlinking process defined - 1390+ TM hours saved FY25.
2. Online order stuck in Hybris - 800+ orders reviewed/remediated.
3. Removal of product during Price discrepancy - 20+ potential major incidents prevented .
4. MFA Administration for Retail accounts
4. NZ Trade price mismatch process
